content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 le petit parisien is a light stylish accessory with gorgeous texture and parisian flair it s knit from the bottom up with a one stitch garter border and an increase at each end of every right side row on the last row an increase is done every 3 stitches in order to gain more width at the top edge
